scripts.watch: bun build --minify --watch --no-clear-screen --sourcemap=inline --outfile=build/dist/style.css src/style.css & bun build --minify --format=iife --watch --no-clear-screen --sourcemap=inline --outfile=build/dist/content.js src/index.ts
scripts.build: bun build --minify --outfile=build/dist/style.css src/style.css && bun build --minify --format=iife --outfile=build/dist/content.js src/index.ts
